subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers signed Matt Cullen, a forward for the Stanley Cup champion Carolina Hurricanes, to a four-year deal worth $11.2 million, the opening day of the N.H.L.'s free-agent market.
snippet: The Rangers signed Matt Cullen, a forward for the Stanley Cup champion Carolina Hurricanes, to a four-year deal worth $11.2 million, the opening day of the N.H.L.'s free-agent market.
